name: Survey analysis overview
description: Explore how digital technologies are being adopted across Europe's agriculture and forestry sectors.

baseWidgets.title: Adoption of technology by country
baseWidgets.question: Has your organisation integrated digital technologies into its workflows?

baseWidgets.title: Sector
baseWidgets.question: Sector (agri/forestry/both)

name: General information
description: Captures basic organisational details (e.g. sector, size, location, stakeholder type)

baseWidgets.title: Type of stakeholder
baseWidgets.question: Type of stakeholder

baseWidgets.title: Location
baseWidgets.question: Location (country/region)

baseWidgets.title: Primary Area of Operation in forestry
baseWidgets.question: Primary area of operation in forestry

baseWidgets.title: Organisation size
baseWidgets.question: Agriculture/forestry organisation size

baseWidgets.title: Type of organisation
baseWidgets.question: What type of organisation are you?

baseWidgets.title: Geographical reach of services
baseWidgets.question: What is the geographical reach of the services that you offer?

name: Adoption of digital technologies and technology integration
description: Assesses which technologies have been implemented and how they are embedded in daily operations.

baseWidgets.title: Integration of digital technologies
baseWidgets.question: Has your organisation integrated digital technologies into its workflows?

baseWidgets.title: Type of digital technology used for agriculture
baseWidgets.question: What type of digital technology has been used for agriculture?

baseWidgets.title: Type of digital technology used for forestry
baseWidgets.question: What type of digital technology has been used for forestry?

baseWidgets.title: Primary functions of technologies in the value chain
baseWidgets.question: What are the primary functions of these technologies in the agriculture or forestry value chain?

baseWidgets.title: Barriers hindering further integration
baseWidgets.question: Are there specific barriers hindering further integration?

name: Technology providers
description: Insights from technology providers serving the agricultural and forestry sectors.

baseWidgets.title: Products/services targeted at agriculture and forestry
baseWidgets.question: What percentage of your products or services are specifically targeted at the agricultural and forestry sectors?

baseWidgets.title: Sales model
baseWidgets.question: What sales model do you primarily use for your products/services?

baseWidgets.title: Primary user types
baseWidgets.question: What type of users do you primarily provide your technology to?

baseWidgets.title: Data types generated or relied upon
baseWidgets.question: What types of data do your products or services generate or rely on?

name: Technology performance
description: Evaluates usability, functionality, and interoperability of the adopted tools

baseWidgets.title: Network connectivity
baseWidgets.question: Do you have network connectivity?

baseWidgets.title: Type of network connectivity
baseWidgets.question: What network connectivity do you use?

baseWidgets.title: Network reliability
baseWidgets.question: How reliable is the current network connectivity? (1 being not reliable, 5 being very reliable)

baseWidgets.title: Further adoption with better connectivity
baseWidgets.question: Would you further adopt digital technologies if you had better network connectivity?

name: Associated costs and prerequisites
description: Technology provider insights on costs, market research, and service offerings.

baseWidgets.title: Cost structure for technology implementation
baseWidgets.question: Can you provide insights into the cost structure associated with implementing and maintaining your technology?

baseWidgets.title: Market research before development
baseWidgets.question: Do you conduct market research or needs assessments before developing digital solutions for agriculture and forestry?

baseWidgets.title: Market penetration strategies
baseWidgets.question: Do you employ specific strategies to penetrate diverse markets within agriculture and forestry?

baseWidgets.title: After-sales service and support
baseWidgets.question: Do you offer any after-sales service, support, or warranty for your products or services?

baseWidgets.title: User needs prioritization in development
baseWidgets.question: Do you prioritize user needs within the agricultural and forestry sectors during the development phase?

name: Data management and data sharing practices
description: Investigates internal and external data handling procedures, governance models, and data access policies

baseWidgets.title: Type of data collected
baseWidgets.question: What type of data do you collect?

baseWidgets.title: Payment for data
baseWidgets.question: Do you pay for this data?

baseWidgets.title: Tools or platforms for data collection
baseWidgets.question: What type of tools or platforms do you use to collect data?

baseWidgets.title: Ability to operate without data
baseWidgets.question: Would you be able to operate without this data?

name: Data storage and flows
description: Explores data storage practices and data sharing flows.

baseWidgets.title: Data storage methods
baseWidgets.question: Where and how do you store this data?

baseWidgets.title: Data sharing practices
baseWidgets.question: Do you share this data?

baseWidgets.title: Data recipients
baseWidgets.question: To whom and where do you send this data?

name: Economic benefits and impact
description: Measures financial performance outcomes such as cost-efficiency, productivity gains, or market access

baseWidgets.title: Cost savings or increased efficiency
baseWidgets.question: Have digital technologies resulted in cost savings or increased efficiency?

name: Environmental and sustainability impact
description: Explores how digital technologies contribute to resource efficiency, emissions reduction, and sustainability targets

baseWidgets.title: Sustainability and environmental practices
baseWidgets.question: Have digital technologies contributed to sustainability and environmental practices?

name: Future outlook
description: Gathers perspectives on planned upgrades, technology trajectories, and potential barriers

baseWidgets.title: Plans to expand or upgrade digital infrastructure
baseWidgets.question: Are there plans to expand or upgrade your current digital infrastructure?
